metadata.title: CVE-2023-25435 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
libtiff 4.5.0 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow viaextractContigSamplesShifted8bits() at /libtiff/tools/tiffcrop.c:3753.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-25435` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10').
